definition[0]: to separate something into all its different parts
example[0]: Tom was always taking things apart in the garage.
definition[1]: to search a place very thoroughly
example[1]: The police took the house apart looking for clues.
definition[2]: to beat someone very easily in a game, sport, fight etc
definition[3]: to show that someone is wrong or something is not true
example[2]: Tariq takes several gay myths apart in his book.
